ssa-supplemental-security-income-elder.s: Supplemental Security Income (SSI) provides financial assistance to older, blind, and people with disabilities to help meet basic needs for food, clothing, and shelter. Complete just one application to be considered for all benefits administered by the Social Security Administration.
ssa-supplemental-security-income-elder.c: A single SSA benefit application will be used to apply to all SSA benefits, but eligibility and approval will be determined for individual benefits.
ssa-supplemental-security-income-elder.e: You are at least 65 years old.
